DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Biomarkers (pro adrenomedullin (MR proADM), pro arginin vasopressin (CT proAVP), pro atrial natriuretic peptid (MR proANP), Pro Endothelin) changes at Day 2, Day 5 and Day 7 of ICU admission are correlated with Intravascular volume assessed by Cr 51 on red blood cells (Day 2 and Day 7) and by I 125 on albumine Day 7. The correlation of these Biomarkers are also evaluted with other markers such as erythropoietin and catecholamines. 80 ICU patients are included.
DOC.criteria: 20 Cerebral Hemorrhage 20 Head Injury 20 post surgery non traumatic non neuro 20 Polytrauma patients Heart failure NYHA III or IV Renal insufficiency creatinin clearance < 30 ml/mn age < 18 Y Pregnancy
